text: Melissa Sue Anderson (born September 26, 1962) is an American actress. She performs in television series and movies. In Little House on the Prairie, she played Mary Ingalls. In the cult classic horror movie Happy Birthday to Me, she played Ginny. Anderson was born in Berkeley, California. title: Melissa Sue Anderson
